title: Investigate HA restart turning server on
description: Find why tool powers on server when Home Assistant restarts; research HA startup behavior.

title: Verify dependabot alert clears after tokio bump
description: GitHub still reports 1 low vulnerability after tokio update; identify remaining advisory and resolve if needed.

title: Commit chore updates for AGENTS.md and beads
description: Commit existing chore changes related to AGENTS.md and beads configuration.

title: Adjust workflow to avoid cross
description: Update CI build workflow to follow sensevoice-bot process without cross; keep only musl aarch64 and x86_64 targets.

title: Add musl Linux release workflow
description: Copy release workflow from another project, keep only x86_64 and aarch64 musl builds, and adapt to ipmi-power-http binary.

title: Investigate reported dependency vulnerability
description: GitHub reported a low severity vulnerability on the default branch after push. Review dependabot alert and decide if updates are needed.

title: Fix aarch64 musl linking in CI
description: Adjust workflow to use zig linker wrapper for aarch64-unknown-linux-musl without cross.
